skins.selfIntroduction: I am the nameship of the An Shan-class destroyers, and one of the Dragon Empery's first-generation "Four Unbreakables." As the flagship, I participated in many naval exercises, carried out surveillance, and engaged in confrontations, leaving behind lasting achievements that I can be proud of. Though I never participated in live combat, I am the destroyer with the most miles under her belt in the entire world!
skins.acquisition: Destroyer, An Shan, reporting for duty! I shall protect my sisters and you, Commander!
skins.login: Wow! Today's schedule looks packed. Let's work hard today!
skins.details: Commander, what would you like to know?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Woah, this is my first time seeing a battleship!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Where did Fu Shun run off to? Would it really kill her to do as I say every now and then?
skins.secretaryIdle3: My sisters - Fu Shun, Chang Chun, and Tai Yuan - are all my pride and joy!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander... Hehe~ doing this occasionally is not all that bad.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey-! My sisters are going to see us...
